groupChat.title: Group Chat Room Title
groupChat.titleAutoGenerate: If no title is entered, it will be automatically generated from the selected chatbot names.
groupChat.createSuccess: Group chat room has been successfully created.
groupChat.createFailed: An error occurred while creating the group chat room.
groupChat.defaultLLMInfo: A general LLM will be automatically added if no agents are selected.

agentManagement.addFailedDesc: An error occurred while adding the agent.
agentManagement.selectAgentPromptDesc: Please select the agent to add.
agentManagement.relationshipSaveSuccessDesc: The relationship with the agent has been updated.
agentManagement.relationshipSaveFailedDesc: An error occurred while setting the relationship.
agentManagement.languageSaveSuccessDesc: The agent response language has been updated.
agentManagement.languageSaveFailedDesc: An error occurred while setting the language.

recommendedTab.noSaved: No recommended characters yet. Get new character recommendations below.
recommendedTab.systemNote: Characters are permanently saved when you enter a topic and get recommendations, preventing duplicate recommendations.

recommendedTab.recommendFailedDesc: An error occurred while recommending characters.
recommendedTab.enterTopicDesc: Please enter the topic or keyword you'd like recommendations for.
recommendedTab.startPrompt: Enter a topic above and click the recommendation button to get character recommendations.

searchTab.title: Search Agents
searchTab.searchPrompt: Enter a search term to find agents.

settings.leaveSuccessDesc: You have left the group chat.
settings.leaveFailedDesc: An error occurred while leaving the chat room.
settings.settingsDesc: You can change the chat room settings.
settings.leaveConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to leave?
settings.leaveConfirmDesc: If you leave the chat room, you will no longer receive messages from this room. If the last user leaves, the chat room will be automatically deleted.
settings.deletedDesc: The chat room has been deleted because the last user left.

persona.name: Name

userModal.userSearchPlaceholder: Enter user name, email or ID

userModal.addFailedDesc: An error occurred while adding the user.

chatSettings.title: Chat Room Settings
chatSettings.description: You can change the chat room settings.
chatSettings.languageLevelDesc: Language level controls translation, sentence complexity, and response freedom. Choose an appropriate level for learners.
chatSettings.relationshipMatrixDesc: Analyze relationships between chatbots to provide more natural conversations.
chatSettings.matrixAutoReset: The relationship matrix will be automatically reset when chatbots are added or removed.
chatSettings.matrixMinRequired: At least 2 chatbots are required to generate a relationship matrix.
chatSettings.matrixGenerateSuccessDesc: The relationship matrix between chatbots has been generated.
chatSettings.matrixGenerateFailedDesc: An error occurred while generating the relationship matrix.
chatSettings.matrixDeleteSuccessDesc: The relationship matrix has been deleted.
chatSettings.matrixDeleteFailedDesc: An error occurred while deleting the relationship matrix.
chatSettings.languageLevelChangeSuccessDesc: The chatbot language level has been changed.
chatSettings.languageLevelChangeFailedDesc: An error occurred while changing the language level.
chatSettings.matrixModalDesc: You can check relationship information between chatbots.
